health_tech: FHIR support for healthcare data interoperability

evidence.claim: Adaxa Technologies utilizes AWS for serverless computing through AWS Lambda.
The company ensures HIPAA compliance for its health tech solutions to protect sensitive patient data.
They support FHIR standards for healthcare applications, enabling interoperability.
Integration patterns adopted include microservices architecture to enhance API capabilities.
Utilization of Azure Functions for event-driven computing as part of their cloud services.

icp.icp_reason: No specific use cases related to X12 or EDI found on the website.
